text: Endeavour is a British television detective drama series created by Russell Lewis and co-produced by Mammoth Screen and Masterpiece in association with ITV Studios. It was first broadcast on ITV in the United Kingdom on 2 January 2012 and on PBS in the United States on 1 July 2012, as part of the Masterpiece Mystery! anthology. Seven series have been broadcast, with the eighth scheduled for 2021. ==Series overview== ==Episode guide== ===Pilot (2012)=== ===Series 1 (2013)=== ===Series 2 (2014)=== ===Series 3 (2016)=== ===Series 4 (2017)=== ===Series 5 (2018)=== ===Series 6 (2019)=== ===Series 7 (2020)=== Series 7 took place in 1970, with Russell Lewis writing the episodes. In the USA, Series 7 airs on Sundays 9, 16, and 23 August 2020 (9:00 pm) on PBS as Masterpiece Theater. ===Series 8 (2021)=== Series 8 is scheduled to be broadcast in 2021. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lists of British crime television series episodes Category:Lists of British drama television series episodes Category:Inspector Morse Category:ITV-related lists
title: List of Endeavour episodes
